headline: Micron Technology (MU): Evaluating Valuation After Strong Earnings and AI-Fueled Guidance Boost
summary: Micron Technology (MU) just wrapped its fiscal year with eye-catching results, as revenue and profits jumped ahead of Wall Street’s estimates. Early guidance for the next quarter looks bright and is underpinned by soaring demand for advanced memory products. See our latest analysis for Micron Technology. Micron’s impressive year-end performance arrives after a wave of positive news, including an affirmed dividend, strong new guidance, and high-profile conference appearances. Enthusiasm around...

headline: Chip stocks rise as OpenAI’s Stargate project fuels AI memory demand hype
summary: Investing.com -- Chip stocks gained ground on Thursday following reports that South Korea’s largest companies signed initial agreements to supply chips to OpenAI’s Stargate project, boosting optimism for artificial intelligence memory demand.
